metadata.title: CVE-2022-28285 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When generating the assembly code forMLoadTypedArrayElementHole, an incorrect AliasSet was used. Inconjunction with another vulnerability this could have been used for an outof bounds memory read. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.8,Firefox < 99, and Firefox ESR < 91.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
